name: Please Stand By -I Got Something To Say 020
description: Please Stand By utilizes the iconic SMPTE color bars template and changes the palette to bring into question viewers perceptions surrounding "standards of color." An offshoot of my original series, I Got Something To Say, adds an additional more literal message. Please Stand By You've Been Replace By AI.  With companies like Deepmind currently working on complex neural networks, AI technology is expected to overtake the majority of menial jobs and even some creative jobs in the not so distant future.  While experts believe AI will simultaneously create new better jobs, the problem lies in political policy.  If policy is not created to properly govern this new technology BEFORE it becomes widely accessible we could see a concentration of power within our population far greater than anything that exists now.
